data.title: Is Evolution Responsive?
data.faq_text: Evolution is built mobile first, this means that we write all of our code for mobile then through media queries we then make the minor adjustments to make our patterns work on the desktop.

data.title: What browsers do we support?
data.faq_text: Evolution has been designed and tested for many browsers and devices. If you would like to see the latest information of what is supported please visit our browser support page.

data.title: What Support is there for IE Compatibility Mode?
data.faq_text: We do not support IE Compatibility mode for any version of IE. IE Compatibility mode will make IE render as IE7 (or worse) which is not supported by Evolution. IE Compatibility mode is also not web standards compliant. Evolution supports IE9 and up, in standards mode. Lastly, through a meta tag, we tell IE to render at the highest version and standards mode available in the version of IE currently being used by the user.
